games.title: Backgammon - Fair Board Games

games.description:

PLAY YOUR WAY:
• Ranked ladder, casual duels or AI practice
• Watch live games or replay every move
• Progress and pets sync across all devices

Download now and make every roll count!

games.title: Solitaire - Classic Card Game
games.subtitle: Timeless patience game
games.description:
Experience the classic Klondike Solitaire with smooth animations and beautiful design. Perfect for all devices, enjoy the timeless card game loved by millions worldwide.

Master your skills with intelligent hint system that suggests the best moves, unlimited undo to correct mistakes, and auto-complete feature to finish games quickly. Track your progress with real-time statistics including score, time, and move count. Auto-save ensures you never lose progress.

Compete on global leaderboards, regional rankings, and challenge friends. Choose your competition style: highest score, fastest time, or fewest moves. Complete daily challenges to earn coins and unlock beautiful background skins to personalize your game. Enjoy automatic dark and light theme switching with haptic feedback for every interaction.

Perfect for commuting, breaks, or relaxing before bed. Play offline anytime, anywhere. Download now and start your Solitaire journey.
